item.title: Epson has launched three business inkjet printers that offer a range of connectivity options and high capacity features
item.description: Source: Epson. TheÂ WorkForce WF-2661. Epson, a company that provides digital imaging and printing solutions, has launched three new inkjet printers for businesses in Singapore. These models are designed for small offices and home offices. The ultra-compact Epson WorkForce series is designed for small spaces and cost-effective printing. These printers include automatic document feeders (ADFs) and Epson Connect, enabling users to print directly from their mobile devices. The new WorkForce series offers easy and flexible printing over Wi-Fi.
